1.content: One day you are looking for something in your room and then come across a strange device called shoe transformation device. You then think its a device that changes your shoes into others but what you don't know is that turns you into the shoe you pick or select. You then point the device at your shoes and push the button all of a sudden you black out, when you wake up everything around you is gigantic you've become a ?
1.title: What's this ?

choices: Use the device to return to normal
Use the device to turn into another type of shoes
Turn your sister in a pair of shoes too
Use the opportunity to experience Cathy's life
11.content:
A pair of high heels. You became a pair of leopard high heels.

"What was going on?!" Was your first thought, but so as you tried to remember, a hard task since you were sort of half of yourself, but the memory ran into you after a moment: "That strange device!"

You try to move, but nothing. It was helpless, there was no way a pair of shoes could move by themselves.

"Wow!" A voice exclaimed behind you. "Oh! What are you two babies doing in this place?" It was your sister behind you.

"Damn! Cathy!!" You swore, knowing she won't be able to resist your new shape.

"I don't know how you got here, but it's obvious Bobby won't even noticed your absence." She giggled and tried you.

It was strange to feel her feet in that way, but the weirdness lasted little.

"This look so..." She began.

"... cute on my feet" You finished with your sister's voice. "And now, what?!"

You exclaimed and began to turned around discovering you were in control of your sister.

"I'm Cathy!" You surprised and looked yourself on her feet. "And I do look cute on her feet!" You giggled, just to covered your mouth by the shock. You were not just controlling your sister's body, you were her. It was even hard to keep thinking about yourself as Bobby. "Oh no. I need to find a way to return to be myself! . . . But I don't want to stop wearing my cute self."
11.title: Use or Used

112.content:
"Well, this is a good opportunity to understand Cathy, isn't?" You giggled observing Cathy from her eyes. "But first I need turn myself into a pair of shoes that Cathy would want to wear on my... her date; after all I can't bath her still wearing myself."

With that idea you returned to your room, picked up the device and returned to your sister's room.

"Well, then, what should I would love to wear... I mean Cathy will want to wear." You giggled again and started transforming yourself into many different kind of shoes until you finally chose. "Ah! This are lovely!!" You exclaimed observing your feet. "With this and that dress, Cameron won't be able to resist me!" You sentenced happily taking out the mentioned dress from Cathy's wardrobe.

"Now is time to take a bath." You giggled undressing yourself.

"Oh." You moaned disappointed observing your sister's body naked just wearing yourself. "This shoes are so cute that I don't want to stop wearing them." You sighed. "But I need to bath now to be ready for my date."

Then you walked to the bed, took of the shoes and left them near it.

"Eh?" Cathy exclaimed noticing completely undressed. "Why am I naked?" She asked.

"Damn!" You swore for your inside after your sister's personality fade. "Why did I end doing something so stupid?!"

"Oh!" Cathy took you up again. "This are even cute that the leopard ones!" She said observing you closely. "And this dress," she noticed it over her bed, "They match perfectly!" Her eyes shined. "I'll gorgeous in... Ah! It's late!! I'll need to take a bath now!" She said placing you on the floor and disappeared on her bathroom.

"What am I going to do?" You sighed. "If she wears me again I need a way to overcome her personality and return to normality. But, agh, I barely can think as myself. I'm Cathy from wherever I'm seen." You sighed even more depressed.

The time passed as you though and before you knew it.

"I knew this will be perfect for me!" You said observing your shoe-form from Cathy's eyes again.

After that you finished preparing your female body for her date.

"I'm Venus." You said overconfident on your body's beauty. "Wait! I need to change myself to normal!" You said looking for the device. And when you found it and pointed to your shoe-self, you hesitated. "But I look awesome in my feet." You sighed and left the device by the side. "I'll do it after I returned from my date!" You sentenced confident in your choice walking out of Cathy's room happy and ready for you date.
112.title: Crazy choice

1122.content:
"See you later." You said waving your hand at Cameron from the door. Dinner and dance, it had been quite an stereotypical date and no matter how much Cathy's would like to get laid, your conscious was not going to let you do it in your sister's body.

"Kyaa! I'm exhausted!" You sentenced sitting at your sister's bed. "Now is time to do it, isn't it?" You said to yourself trying to suppress Cathy's love for shoes. You pointed the device to yourself and returned to normality... or so you thought.

You breathed deeply and saw your sister lying on her bed, she collapsed unconscious at the very moment you began to turn into a non-shoe-being.

You returned to your room and prepared to sleep, but before getting into bed you observed your bare feet and sighed willing to wear high heels again.
1122.title: After the Date

11221.content:
Something curious about Saturdays is that there's actually little to do if you are not studying anymore. So it was the perfect for you under your actual circumstances.

"Ok, lets check this gain." You mumbled while observing the device again. The strange gun like gadget seemed to have just a trigger button and the words "shoe transformation device" carved in its metal surface. However, after observed it closely you found a little groove in its handle. You forced it a little and managed to open it revealing a little sort of mechanical control panel.

"I thought it would be more... electronic." You thought seeing the three little knobs inside the device. "Ok. Lets see what this are for."

You force your sighed to read the little inscriptions: "Consciousness, Memories, Timer." And around the knobs there where numbers: " 1 to 17".

"Ok..." You mumbled confused, but since all the knobs where located at the same number, one, you just move them all to 7. "Lets see what I have done."

You thought about becoming your sister again, but it was really hard to overcome her maniacal love to shoes, that you better avoided the risk of getting to attached to her personality. Then you thought about your mother, after all she is a person who wears shoes without being crazy for them.

It was perfect that your mother were taking a bath just in that moment. You sneaked into her room and replaced the shoes her had already chosen with a copy of them made of yourself.

The time passed, but suddenly...

"My god!" You stated over taking your mother's body faster than Cathy's. "I'm mom and I'm late." You said sawing your wristwatch. You take your purse and left.

"I'm really late." You said driving your car. "But..." You hesitated at the first stop. "I'm not Janet, I'm Bobby..." You sentenced recovering a little of yourself. "I'm Bobby," you repeated, "and I'm seeing my besties, Karen and Melanie, at the new cafeteria." You said. "But I don't even know them... well, we were classmates at the faculty." It was harder to found Bobby at Janet, but at least you were sure about something. "Damn it! That stupid device turned my son it my shoes!"
11221.title: Next day, your mothers feet

choices: Cathy has to go to work.
Cathy's friends want to hang out.
11222.content: You wake up the next day. It's early. You hear the sound of a shower. Your sister is getting ready for the day. It's during this time that everyone assumes you leave for school, but you decided to ditch today, just to pleasure yourself. With device in hand, you sneak to the front. You know your sister always lays out her shoes downstairs before she leaves. At the front door, you see them: black suede platform wedge sandals. You pointed the device at them and immediately, you turned into the shoes. You waited, then heard thuds behind you. You felt a slight pressure on top of your head then suddenly, your perspective changed. You were now your sister, adjusting the straps on her shoes. "I can't wait to..." then you remembered: What does your sister do during the day? Her phone in her purse began vibrating. You took it out of "your" purse. The message was from...
11222.title: Next day, your sister again

112221.content:
"Are you free today? If you like, you can earn something extra. Gina." The message said. You think it must be Gina, her boss from the place she works. You think about it, your sister wanted to go out today to hang out with some friends, but she might be more interested in working. She was talking nonstop about those shoes she just thought were perfect. You text back that you will be there in fifteen minutes. You put the phone back in "your" purse and walk over to the bus stop. A bus takes you away a few minutes later to the mall.

Your sister works...
112221.title: Cathy has to go to work.

choices: Become one of the store shoes
1122211.content:
Cathy was lucky to get a job at a shoe store, given her obsession with shoes. You arrived at the shoe store. A wave of excitement and nervousness came over you, and you couldn't help but giggle. You walked in and were immediately greeted by Gina. "Thank goodness you're here." She said relieved. "We're expecting a very busy day today."

"Good thing I came in today then!" you responded in a singsong tone. The store opened, and what started out as a few people soon turned into a large crowd. As Bobby, you thought you had no good fashion sense. Thankfully though, you were Cathy, and you were able to help all of the customers with ease.

"Those heels are great for a night out!"

"Those flats look so cute on you!"

"Definitely go with the booties."

You, as Cathy, were a pro at this.

About halfway through the day, you found yourself exhausted. Walking to the employee room, you sat down on the bench. Not fully thinking, you began to remove your wedges. Right as your foot left contact, you instantly transformed back into just the shoes. "No wait!" you thought to yourself. Cathy was relaxed on the bench, massaging her head. Soon, Gina came in. "Cathy, darling. You look tired!"

"Sorry Gina." Cathy replied. "This entire morning just whizzed by me, I don't remember anything it all!"

"Well, how about we get some coffee?" Gina asked. "I'll pay, and Miranda can take over!" Cathy got up and followed Gina, but suddenly hesitated. "Whoops, I forgot my shoes!"

"Darling don't worry about it!" Gina responded. She pulled out a pair of flats from her purse. "Take these, you owe it to yourself." Cathy put on the flats and left the store. All you could do was sit there and watch, stuck as wedge sandals. There was nothing else you could do. You watched the store from floor level. There were many customers in the store, trying on shoes, and Miranda, the other employee, was running around frantically, trying to help them all. You looked at the wide variety of shoes in the store, and a strange feeling of jealousy came over you. "I should be one of those newer shoes!" you thought to yourself. "What's the worst that could happen? My family won't mind if I'm gone for a few days."

In an event of luck, Miranda rushed out of the employee room, knocking the table with Cathy's purse. The purse fell, and the remote fell out, buttons down. You instantly stumbled backwards in your human form, with Cathy's shoes right in front of you. You quickly looked around, and thankfully Miranda was too busy to notice. You got up, put Cathy's purse back on the table, and picked up the remote. You made your way back further into the employee area, where the entire stock of the shoe store was held. You also noticed a locker half open. Out of curiosity, you opened it. The inside of the door had pictures of Miranda and her husband. Inside the locker was a leather motorcycle jacket on a hanger and black ballet flats on the top shelf.
1122211.title: in a shoe store.

choices: Become a shoe in the stock room
Become a shoe in the main store
11222111.content:
This is it: the jackpot. You're in a shoe store and you can be any shoe! The possibilities are virtually endless.

But this required a bit more thought.

On one hand, the store was busy and you could be a selection of any shoe on the store shelves. There's a good chance someone would try you on and then buy you, and you'd end up with (and possibly as) a complete stranger immediately.

On the other hand, the stock of shoes in the back of the store were more varied, but the odds of leaving the store were very slim. You could end up as a pair of shoes for more than a year! "Would I still have to eat? How would this work?" you thought to yourself.

You couldn't stay in the back room the entire day, so you decided to. . .
11222111.title: Become one of the store shoes

112221112.title: Become a shoe in the main store

choices: Transform yourself again and get worn
13.content:
"What's going on?" You asked yourself noticing everything around you is enormous. You tried to run, move, turn your head, anything, but nothing. You were stuck there.

You kept trying, and saw the good side: by how your feel you deducted you had no arms, legs, mouth, you even probably no even had head or even eyes... though you can see anyway. So Which was the good part? You were still a live... Nah! You panicked going from wrath to fear and then depression for all the time you were there, on the floor wondering: What was that red thing that somehow was coming out from you? Fabric? Suede perhaps?

Wait!

That strange gun like device! It was labeled "Shoe Transformation Device"! You had become some sort of shoe!

You made an effort to remember what crossed trough your mind when you pull the trigger. Yeah! Your first thought was a new pair of expensive tennis, but then you though about the red flats your sister was wearing last day. And that was it! You became a pair of Flat shoes!

However knowing that wasn't of help.

You were stuck there as an unliving object, a pair of shoes. What can you do? What was going to be of you from now on? Probably you would end as part of your sister's collection. Being worn by her every now and then, but... what if non of your female relatives wanted to use you? Were you going to end being dotated or worst, thrown away?

You lost your mind to the point you completely lose track of time. And when you was almost going to give up on youself, you returned to be yourself.

"Eh?" was the only thing you managed to said as you recovered control of yourself. You observed the ceiling over you, lying there. The effect had passed. You sat in disbelieve and began to laugh.

"So it has a time limit." You continued laughing.

It took you sometime to recovered.

It was quite an experience becomeing a pair of shoes. Scary, yeah, at least until discovering you would return to normal after a time. But then what would you do with your new "power"?
13.title: Flat Shoes

131.content:
"About four hours" You thought as realizing how much time you were turned into a shoe. "Is not that much, though there are plenty of things you can do in that time."

You thought.

"Well, I know a certain someone that an experience like this would "help"." You grinned deviously thinking about your sister. She was such a shoe maniac that already have about sixty pairs. "Maybe being one would help you over come your obsession." You said pointing to the mirror as when you were a kid playing as a cowboy on the garden.

It was thursday, so your sister would return from here work without any other apointment later. The perfect moment for a shock therapy.

And just as expected, she arrived about nine. She walked directly into her room. but beforeshe could closed the door, Bang, you hit her with the ray.

High heels, leopard high heels.

"Perfect." You grinned. "Let's see how you feel as part of your own collection." You thought as you approached to the open door.

Why didn't you said it out loud? Well, by your experience she was probably concious and aware of her surrounds. And you wasn't looking for a fight.

"Sis?" you asked peeping into the room, just to be sure she can't respond. You sighed relieved she was just as any other shoe.

You breathed deeply and went into: Phase 2.

You picked her up and was then when everything changed.

A jolt went across your whole body and then you knew your sisters consciousness was gone (my it was just sleep) and second, you felt a horrible desirite to try her on.

You only gulped observing your sister willing to try her.
131.title: Your sister

choices: Go down as your were in that moment
Turn your sis in male shoes and go down as "yourself"
1311.content:
There was no one around, was there?

You gulped again and reluctantly took of your tennis and socks. You were impresed that even after stop touching them and leaving them a side, you were still so into wearing her in the form. She had become a pair of leopard high heels and you are a man for god sake.

You hesitated till the very last moment, but at the end something pushed you to do it.

A second jolt.

What was going on this time?

You didn't know it at first. You feel fine. You were you, but something felt out of place. You stood up from your sister's bed and walked around. It was were how natural it felt to be there and not at your own room. You sighed confuse.

"Well it most be nothing." You shrugged and walked up to your sister's closeth.

She had quite a good taste. You observed her clothes and your attention was trapped by her shoes collection. You even took up some to appreciate them and found them lovely. And you finally realised it. You were somehow your sister now.

It was so confusing, but something became extremely obsious to you. You had been walking around all her room wearing her, a pair of high heel shoes, and not a just high heels, a five inches pair. And you were there, standing at the center of her room as if nothing.

And you got I simple idea: "Let se how far I had become her."

You felt weird on your own clothes since you began to wear her, so you went into her wardrobe and took of a dress, but not just a dress, no; a dress you felt would look great with your actual shoes.

You undressed and after giving it a long thought you even took of your underwear and took some of your sister's.

I was so bizarre, surreal, but you felt gorgeous wearing all that attire. You observed yourself at her full length mirror and you just saw yourself and smiled.

I became hilarious later, but it was as it should be in that moment.

"Kat, dinner is ready." You mother said to you.

What time was it?! Almost ten!! You had been caught, however... "Kat?" Did your mother actually called you "Kat"? You gulped and said, "I'll go down in a minute, mom."

You hesitated and finally decided.
1311.title: Your sister

choices: Your sister went back to normal
You restored her with the gun
13111.content:
You breathed deeply and finally took courage to expand your "experiment".

You went to the dining room not just wearing high heels, but a comeplete female attire.

"Helo, mom, how was yourday?" You asked, taking a seat.

"Tiresome, quite a busy day at the clinic." She answered.

And finally the moment of the true. She observed you for the first time. Her face was puzzled, but not by the fact that you were wearing your sister's dress, but because she couldn't know what was wrong with the picture.

"Is there any problem, mom?" You asked nervously.

"Eh? Ah! No, sorry." She said shaking her head, trying to shake off her doubts. "Well, you look great on you, Bobby... had you ever had that dress?" She asked confussed, but still unsure why.

"Kat, just lent it to me." You said curious about how was your mother going to react. "It goes perfect with my new shoes."

"Really?"

"Yeah, let me show you." It was hard to believe how much of your sister you became, but it was even harder to believe that your own mother was somehow accepting that as normal. You stood up and went to show her. "You see."

"Yeah, really a sexy. Honey." She accepted. "You will get lot of guys wearing them." She sentenced as you returned to your seat.

"Yea, lots of them." You sentenced a little sarcastic.

"Just don't forget to use protecction," she sentenced, "you are still young to get pregnant."

"Though I'm a guy." You corrected.

"Yes, that... so were is your brother." She asked trying not to think.

"Sister, you mean, right?"

"Yes, Bobby, your sister." Your mother accepted a little annoyed.

"She is sleeping at her room." He lied.

"Well, tell him... her that I'll leave the dinner on the oven so he... she wants something later."

It was impressive that she didn't figured out, though it was obvious that she knew something was wrong there. But each time she approached to the problem, her mind slided to a different subject. She even asked you about your last appointment with the gynecologist... though you did answere, lying, but seriously enough that you yourself thought you were saying the true.

It was the most stressful dinner ever.

Your mother didn't waste a seconf to escape to her room after finishing.

And you did the same. Well, somehow, since you ran into your sister's room.

You got a headache. So you didn't try to give it a deep thought to that experience. You wandered around your sister's room a little more. You took off the dress and got into Cathy's pajama. You began to read the book she had been reading at night and even got moved by the romance in it.

2 o'clock.

You look at the wall clock and thought you should go to sleep now. You took off your heels. turned off the light and laid down on your sister's bed.

"Wait! What am I doing?" You suddenly reacted.

You stood up and went to turn on the light. Everything was wrong.

You saw the clock and it was about half-hour later. You sister was still there in shoe-form. But you weren't her anymore. You tried to think, but felt exhausted. So you just pointed to take off Cathy's pajama and ran into your room.

"That was weird." You sentenced after closing your room's door.

You jumped into your bed a fell sleep, hoping that your sister could return to her formal self by next day. Or at least that you could do that with the gun tomorrow.

You just wanted to rest that night.
13111.title: You/your sister

choices: Give it a try at your part time job
131111.content:
You breathed relieved when you saw your sister at the breakfast.

"What's with you?" She asked. "You look awfull."

"I'm fine, just a bad night." You said yawning.

The breakfast went as always. Thought you were quite alert to the conversation of the girl in your house.

Nothing.

They said nothing about what took place last night, they, both, talked as if the conversation of last night had been between them and not with you.

Does that mean that it had been just a dream? Whatever, it was over now.

The morning went faster in the normal routine. Your mother and sister went to their jobs as you took sometime before going to your part time job. But before you left your room, you saw it, the shoe device.

It was a dream, wasn't it?

You gulped and decided.
131111.title: Back to normal

choices: Two staff members of another store
1311111.content:
Working part time at the mall's arcade wasn't that bad considering how difficult it was to get a job.

"Did a zombie bite you, man?" Roberto asked you.

"As if..." You replied.

But he was right at something, you had been all quiet and thoughtful through the whole morning. You had you mind full with all what had happened the day before: Turning into a pair of shoes, transforming your own sister into a pair too and "being her by wearing her" also. Not matter how you look at it, it was to much to handle if it was not a dream.

"Any way, is our brake. Wanna get a burger or something?"

"Yeah, why not?"

Nothing.

"Man, you do are all zombie-like to day." You friend pointed almost finishing his lunch.

"Well..." You hesitated, "I just have something in mind."

"Really?"

"Yeah, I got a really weird night with Kat...." You mumble finally getting into your burger.

"She is quite hot," Roberto began, "don't tell me you finally fall for her and crossed a forbidden line." He mocked.

"She is my sister." You just pointed irritated.

"Ok, ok, my bad. So what happened?"

"I'm not completely sure myself."

"That doesn't help, man."

"Well, I found this strange toy gun and... well... somehow it wasn't a toy." You tried to explain.

"Don't tell me you shoot her of something like that?" He asked nervously.

"I did, but..."

"Hey! Police, I have a murdered here." Your friend outlouded in quite a plane monotono interrupting you.

"I did't killed her," You stated annoyed and hesistating mumble the end, "just turned her into a pair of shoes."

"Eh?"

"She became a pair of shoes." You repeated shily.

"Quite a desillusion that of yours." He said looking at you with "were you drunk?" writen on his face.

"I know, but... well... I know! But still... I brought it just to see if it wasn't just my mind."

"How?"

"Maybe with a witness..." you hesitated.

"Or and accomplice." He interrupted sarcstically. "Well, lets see if you did got nuts after work."

You just sighed.

The time went faster after that and the clock finally marked the end of your turn.

"So what are we going to do?" Roberto asked when you finally got out of the store.

"Well, with need someone to prove it on?" You said showing him the plastic gun, as you noticed your friends disappointment.
1311111.title: Part timer

13111112.content:
"So what's your plan?" Roberto asked you.

"Telling the true, I have no idea." You sighed.

"You really are useless when needed, man." He sentenced disappointed. "So all you need is someone to shot with your toy, preferably where no one else can see us, right?"

"Yeah."

"Could it be anyone?"

"Yes, that's all."

"Ok, follow me."

You follow your friend.

"Where are we going?" You asked when you entered into the mall's wineries.

"You will see." He sentenced.

Ten minutes later we reached area where the dressess for the female stores arrive.

"what are we doing here?" I asked with a low voice.

"Well, you see, I found accidentaly while helping a little blind point here."

"A blind point?"

"Yeah." He said and then turned around. "There they are."

And I saw them, to girls from one of the fashion stores.

I couldn't react. I followed my friend and before those girls or any one else could know what was going on, I shoot. Since I couldn't visualise a form, those girl ended transformed on her current shoes.

"Damt it! It was true!" Roberto exclaimed astonished.

"I told you so."

"Damn, this is so weird. Wat are we going to do now?"

"Well, return them to normal and scape would be the best, don't you think?"

"Provably, but..."

"What?"

"Didn't you say we can 'take their roles' if we wear them?"

"What are you thinking?!"

"Let's try them."

"But"

"Come on, this is quite an opportunity!" He said taking of his shoes.

"Ok"

"This is so weird." He said after getting into a pair o shoes."

"I know it." I agreed wearing the other pair. "So what do you think?"

"This is fabulous." He said happily. "Did I said 'fabulous' just now?"

"Yeah."

"So sissy." He laughed in a weird girlish manner. "I do feel like this girl. I even want to try those dressess on."

"They are so fabulous for not to do it." I laughed girlishly too.

The sync had begun.
13111112.title: Two staff members of another store

get going to that date quickly

1313.title: please continue this

choices: start forgetting how you are again
13131.content:
"I'll cancel your right mom"
It was impressive that she didn't figured out, though it was obvious that she knew something was wrong there. But each time she approached to the problem, her mind slided to a different subject. She even asked you about your last appointment with the gynecologist... though you did answer, seriously enough that you yourself thought you were saying the true.
It was the most freeing dinner ever.
Your mother didn't waste a second to escape to her room after finishing.
And you did the same. Well, somehow, since you ran into your sister's room.
You got a headache. So you didn't try to give it a deep thought to that experience. You wandered around your sister's room a little more. You took off the dress and got into Cathy's pajama. You began to read the book she had been reading at night and even got moved by the romance in it.
2 o'clock AM.
You look at the wall clock and thought you should go to sleep now. You left your heels on as they were way to cute to take off, then turned off the light and laid down on your sister's bed and quickly feel asleep, when you wake up the next day you think it was a dream as your acting like your self again,
"What a weird dream and my voice sounds a little funny" You suddenly reacted.
You stood up and went to turn on the light. Everything was wrong you looked and sounded just like her
You saw the clock and it was about noon You tried to think, but felt exhausted. So ran too your room to find your old self there so you go back to her room,
"That was weird." You sentenced after closing her room's door.
You went to take her shoes off, hoping that your sister could return to her formal self. Or at least that you could do it with that with the gun
Shes not turning back as you panic
13131.title: cancel and go to sleep in your sisters room

choices: Try to make some else to wear you
Do what ever you want inside your sister
14.content:
Seeing things from bellow did make them seem huge or so you thought as you stood up.

"That was weird." You claimed completely unconscious of what had just passed to you. "Oh. Yeah. The shoes gun." You remembered and started looking for it.

It didn't take you long, it was lying in the floor near a pair of wedge sandals.

"Sandals?" You mumbled confused, but just ignored them until you tried to hold the device.

"WHAT?!" You exclaimed the third time your hand went across the gadget and you understood it. "I'm a ghost..."

The idea was awkward. A ghost without dying or worst with your body intact. You freaked out.

Time passed until you finally accepted your situation and decided to try something. You walked to your room's door and tried to go through it.

"That was boring." You complained behind the door.

Flying, a ghost should fly, didn't it?

You went to the nearest window and jumped. "At least it doesn't hurt." You sighed standing up after a hard earth diving.

You were now outside of your house. There you heard the voice of our neighbor and went to give a look. You passed your head through the fence and saw her. She even passed near you and didn't noticed you at all.

"Maybe I should join to..." You said giving three steps into her backyard and suddenly a enormous power pulled you back.

"Ouch!" You grunted as you finally felt something, pain. "What was that?" You said but didn't get and answer.

Then you heard her, your sister just arrived.

"Well, there is still another ghost trick to try." You grinned.

You ran down the stair and found your sister at the kitchen.

"Now is when." You did not think it twice. You jumped into her and discovered you could possess her.

"Nice." You smiled hearing your sister voice. "Well, lets see if this works." You wondered walking to the entrance of the house. You breathed deeply and went out. After a few steps the inevitable passed. The mysterious power pulled you out of your sister's body and through you exactly over the sandal you saw when awaking.

You thought for a second... "Could it be?"

You then tried again the experiment of possessing your sister, but this time before going out you changed her shoes for the sandals.

"Here was where..." You hesitated and you gave one more step.

Nothing, this time there was no mysterious pulling energy.

"So as long as I wear this I'm in control." You smiled as you walked thinking about what to do next.
14.title: Wedge sandal

15.content: You've selected another type of shoe
15.title: another type of shoe

choices: Use device to turn into another kind of boots.
151.content:
A pair of high heeled boots. You became a pair of black high heeled boots.

"What was going on?!" Was your first thought, but so as you tried to remember, a hard task since you were sort of half of yourself, but the memory ran into you after a moment: "That strange device!"

You try to move, but nothing. It was helpless, there was no way a pair of boots could move by themselves.

"Wow!" A voice exclaimed behind you. "Oh! What are you two babies doing in this place?" It was your sister behind you.

"Damn! Cathy!!" You swore, knowing she won't be able to resist your new shape.

"I don't know how you got here, but it's obvious Bobby won't even noticed your absence." She giggled and tried you.

It was strange to feel her feet and legs in that way, but the weirdness lasted for a short time.

"This look so..." She began.

"... cute on me!" You finished with your sister's voice. "And now, what?!"

You exclaimed and began to turned around discovering you were in control of your sister.

"I'm Cathy!" You surprised and looked yourself on her feet. "And I do look cute on her feet!" You giggled, just to covered your mouth by the shock. You were not just controlling your sister's body, you were her. It was even hard to keep thinking about yourself as Bobby. "Oh no. I need to find a way to return to be myself! . . . But I don't want to stop wearing my cute self."
151.title: a high heeled boot

1511.title: Use device to turn into another kind of boots.

info.description: Your name is Bobby Nor you are 22 you have a sister named Cathy Nor who is 24 and a hot milf mother named janet Nor who is 47. You are a very fit healthy guy who loves to work out and hang with friends. Your sister who is a busty hot girl loves shoes so very much that she gets a new pair almost everyday, your mother is also a very busty women that loves shoes but isn't super crazy about them like your sister. Little did you know your about to come across something that is going to change your life forever. Please keep this about turning into shoes anything else maybe ok but just keep it mainly about becoming a shoe and being worn that is all = )
